content: are several inches of both yarns left hanging give a little tug to each end to tighten there are many methods for joining new yarn if you have a favorite use that one instead finishing loosely bobble all sts knitwise weave in ends block if desired for a more decorative edge you might choose to do a picot bind off if you have any questions about this pattern please contact me via email at hello@laurabethknits com or on ravelry ​ ​ as laurabeth326 ©laura peters 2017 giant square scrap blanket v1 | 2
